name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
schedule:
1-4 週 Carbonyl Compound I: Carboxylic Acids and its Derivatives
5-8 週 CarbonylCompound II: Reactions of Aldehydes and Ketones
9 週 期中考
10-13 週 CarbonylCompounds III: Reactions at the alpha-Carbon
14-17 週 More About Oxidation-Reduction Reactions and Amines
18 週 期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry
Paula Yurkanis Bruice
6th Ed.
